meanings.sent1: The monthlong vacation was a dream come true for the family.
meanings.sent2: She planned a monthlong celebration for her birthday.
meanings.sent3: The monthlong rainstorm made everyone feel a bit gloomy.
meanings.sent4: The monthlong journey across the desert tested their endurance.
meanings.sent5: The monthlong festival brought joy to the entire town.

meanings.definition: Occurring over the course of a month.
meanings.sent1: The monthlong project required careful planning and coordination.
meanings.sent2: Her monthlong absence was deeply felt by her friends.
meanings.sent3: The monthlong baking competition brought out the best in all participants.
meanings.sent4: The monthlong wait for the results felt like an eternity.
meanings.sent5: The monthlong training program prepared them for the upcoming competition.
